review_blob: 1st taste from the Pint Sized bottle was fantastic, problem was I followed it up with Meantimes IPA & found it way below the mark of what I had hoped it to be. But in saying that a great effort from the boys @Little Creatures. Strong use of cascade left a nice but small explosion of passionfruit & grapefruit & a nice long after taste of caramel & toffee flavours. On tap @The Mary Ellen Hotel, Merewether, cant do it justice by rating it after a day @the races drinking mass produced soap water that is Tooheys Extra Dry. Will rate it on tap this week sometime.
beer_name: Little Creatures Single Batch India Pale Ale
